body_html: @carefree0910 Can you provide context for this change? Why does it need to be made? This is adding to the API so will require API review before a lot of work should be done on it, and they will need more context as to why this is necessary.
body_text: @carefree0910 Can you provide context for this change?  Why does it need to be made?  This is adding to the API so will require API review before a lot of work should be done on it, and they will need more context as to why this is necessary.
